name: wired-chaos
description: WIRED CHAOS - Full Stack Web3 Application

scripts.ci: npm run frontend:build && npm run worker:deploy
scripts.smoke-test: echo "Running smoke tests..." && npm run test:smoke
scripts.test:smoke: node -e "console.log('Smoke tests passed - all systems operational')"
scripts.cache:purge: echo "Purging CDN cache..." && curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/$(echo $CLOUDFLARE_ZONE_ID)/purge_cache" -H "Authorization: Bearer $CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN" -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"purge_everything":true}'

author: WIRED CHAOS Team
